name: Kampf Um Eriador
overview: A German language freeware strategy game written by Ralf Bowing and Roland Hartz and created using AmigaBASIC. Battle for Eriador is set in the early years of Eglador, the battle between the rulers of light and darkness broke out for the first time. However, neither side has yet been able to achieve a final victory, But in the year 6735 of the Second Age, the fierce battle that would determine the future began between the two opponents. In the land of Eriador, the fate of Eglador is decided between the remaining legions...
